metadata.name: Dreamscape
metadata.description:
1080p, 24 FPS, 6sec

Enter the dreamscape.

For this piece, I got inspired by a number of artists on Pinterest. This project started out as a portal and evolved into an entirely something different.
Something dreamy/space like.

This was one of the intensive personal projects I have done.

Responsible for everything: landscape, particle flow, portal, BG clouds, and stars. 

Done with Houdini and Redshift.
Compositing done in Nuke
